key_risks: Legal and fiduciary concerns due to ongoing investigations and lawsuits
Intense competition from established players like Microsoft, Asana, and Monday.com
Dependence on third-party cloud infrastructure providers and integration partners
Customer concentration risk with significant revenue from large enterprise clients
Economic sensitivity tied to business spending and potential downturns
Data security and privacy risks despite robust measures
Financial leverage and integration challenges from the $3.2 billion private debt financing
controversies: Investigation by multiple law firms for potential breaches of fiduciary duties
Lawsuit against insurers regarding coverage disputes and breach of contract
Class-action lawsuit alleging inadequate disclosure of material information to shareholders
social_issues: Complaints filed with the Better Business Bureau regarding customer access and licensing
governance_issues: Potential breaches of fiduciary duties related to the acquisition by Blackstone and Vista Equity Partners
Concerns over the adequacy of the sale price and process
